p.e:
1. PLEASE INTRODUCE YOURSELF TO
THE VIEWERS AND TELL US WHAT
YOUR PROJECT IS CALLED.
2.TELL US MORE ABOUT HOW YOUR
PROJECT CAME TO BE. WHAT
INSPIRED YOU TO START IT? WHY
DID YOU WANT TO DO IT?
3. WALK US THROUGH YOUR
CREATION. IF AVAILABLE, WE'LL PLAY
B-ROLL WHILE YOU SPEAK.
4. WHAT IS VR TO YOU? WHAT IS
ANYLAND TO YOU? WHY DO YOU MAKE?
WHY DO YOU CREATE? PAUSE BETWEEN
EACH ITEM FOR AUDIO CUTS.
5. IF YOU WISH, SHARE MORE DETAILED
NOTES ON YOUR PROJECT HERE. SPEAK
AS CLEARLY AS YOU CAN. IF YOU MESS
UP, PAUSE MOMENTARILY AND START
THE PHRASE AGAIN.
6. IF YOU WISH, TELL US ABOUT YOUR 
FAVORITE MEMORY FROM ANYLAND. 
THIS CAN BE ANYTHING YOU WANT!

REMEMBER, ENJOY YOURSELF
AND JUST BE NATURAL!
